title: Matt Whitley
text:
Matt Whitley (born 20 January 1996) is an English <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a forward for the <a href="Catalans%20Dragons">Catalans Dragons</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Super%20League">Betfred Super League</a> and the <a href="England%20Knights">England Knights</a> at international level. 
He previously played for the <a href="Widnes%20Vikings">Widnes Vikings</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>.
Background.
Whitley was born in <a href="Billinge%2C%20Merseyside">Billinge</a>, <a href="Merseyside%2C%20England">Merseyside, England</a>.
Career.
He made his début for Widnes on 10 April 2015 against the <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington Wolves</a>, and signed a full-time contract with the club two weeks later.
On 9 October 2021, Whitley played for <a href="Catalans%20Dragons">Catalans Dragons</a> in their <a href="2021%20Super%20League%20Grand%20Final">2021 Super League Grand Final</a> defeat against St. Helens.
International career.
In July 2018 he was selected in the <a href="England%20Knights">England Knights</a> Performance squad. Later that year he was selected for the England Knights on their tour of <a href="Papua%20New%20Guinea">Papua New Guinea</a>. He played against <a href="Papua%20New%20Guinea%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Papua New Guinea</a> at the <a href="Oil%20Search%20National%20Football%20Stadium">Oil Search National Football Stadium</a>.
